漢: (kan) - China, homem entre homens, o homem dos homens
漢人: (からびと) - Chinese person; Korean person
漢倭奴国王印: (かんのわのなのこくおうのいん) - King of Na gold seal (National Treasure of Japan)
漢名: (かんめい) - Chinese name (often of plants and animals)
漢和: (かんわ) - China and Japan; Chinese and Japanese (languages); Chinese Character-Japanese dictionary
漢和字典: (かんわじてん) - Chinese-Japanese character dictionary
漢和辞典: (かんわじてん) - Chinese-Japanese character dictionary
漢奸: (かんかん) - Chinese traitor (esp. a collaborator with the Japanese)
漢字コード化集合: (かんじコードかしゅうごう) - kanji coded set
漢字制限: (かんじせいげん) - restrictions on the number of kanji recognized for usage (recognised)
漢字制限論: (かんじせいげんろん) - the question of limiting the use of Chinese characters
漢字圏: (かんじけん) - countries that currently use Chinese characters in their writing, or have used in their recent past
漢字文化: (かんじぶんか) - (the so-called) kanji culture
漢字文化圏: (かんじぶんかけん) - countries which use Chinese characters
漢字検定: (かんじけんてい) - test of kanji skills; kanji test
漢字直接入力: (かんじちょくせつにゅうりょく) - direct kanji input (as opposed to kana-kanji conversion)
漢字符号化方式: (かんじふごうかほうしき) - kanji encoding method
漢字習熟度検定: (かんじしゅうじゅくどけんてい) - kanji proficiency test
漢字試験: (かんじしけん) - kanji test; test of kanji skills
漢字音: (かんじおん) - Japanese pronunciation of a kanji (based on adopted Chinese pronunciations)
漢字ＵＲＬ: (かんじユーアールエル) - kanji URL
漢学: (かんがく) - Sinology; study of China or of the Chinese classics
漢学者: (かんがくしゃ) - Sinologist; scholar of the Chinese classics
漢才: (からざえ) - mastery of Chinese literature; Sinology
漢数字: (かんすうじ) - Chinese characters which express numbers
漢文: (かんぶん) - Chinese classical literature; literature written entirely in kanji
漢文典: (かんぶんてん) - dictionary of kanbun grammar and usage
漢文学: (かんぶんがく) - Chinese literature; literature in Chinese
漢文訓読: (かんぶんくんどく) - reading a Chinese text in Japanese
漢文訓読文: (かんぶんくんどくぶん) - kanbun converted into literary Japanese
漢方医: (かんぽうい) - doctor of Chinese (herbal) medicine
漢方薬: (かんぽうやく) - Chinese herbal medicine
漢族: (かんぞく) - Han race; Han people
漢書: (かんしょ) - Chinese book; book written in Chinese
漢検: (かんけん) - kanji test; test of kanji skills
漢民族: (かんみんぞく) - Chinese people; Han race
漢水: (かんすい) - lye water (for making Chinese noodles)
漢熟検: (かんじゅくけん) - kanji proficiency test
漢直: (かんちょく) - direct kanji input (as opposed to kana-kanji conversion)
漢竹: (かんちく) - Chinese bamboo; bamboo imported from China (often used to make flutes)
漢籍: (かんせき) - Chinese books; Chinese classics
漢英字典: (かんえいじてん) - Kanji to English dictionary
漢英辞典: (かんえいじてん) - Kanji to English dictionary
漢薬: (かんやく) - Chinese medicine; herbal medicine
漢越音: (かんえつおん) - Vietnamese reading (of Chinese characters)
漢音: (かんおん) - Han reading of Chinese characters
漫々的: (マンマンデー) - slow (chi: màn màn de); at ease
漫り: (みだり) - selfish/with disregard for order or rules; reckless/rash/careless; loose/bawdy; irrational/illogical
漫ろ: (すぞろ) - restless/on edge (and unable to concentrate)/distracted; (of an emotional or psychological state) for some reason
漫ろに: (そぞろに) - in spite of oneself; somehow; without knowing why; vaguely
漫ろ歩き: (そぞろあるき) - slow, relaxed walk; stroll
漫ろ言: (そぞろごと) - rambling talk; vague remarks
漫喫: (まんきつ) - manga cafe; coffee shop with a manga library (usu. has Internet facilities and charges by the hour)
漫才師: (まんざいし) - (one of) a comic duo
漫文: (まんぶん) - random jottings; rambling essays
漫楽: (まんがく) - manzai (comic dialogue) accompanied by music
漫画化: (まんがか) - caricaturing; turning a movie, novel, etc. into a manga/making a comic version of something
漫画字: (まんがじ) - comic font; rounded handwriting
漫画映画: (まんがえいが) - animated film; cartoon
漫画研究会: (まんがけんきゅうかい) - society for the study of manga; manga club
漫研: (まんけん) - society for the study of manga; manga club
漫符: (まんぷ) - signs, symbols and characters used in manga to represent actions, emotions, etc.
